ComicInfo.Title: Pimps, Ho's and Hocus Pocus! Part Four
ComicInfo.Summary:
This is it! Now that Janey has merged souls with Xula to form a powerful entity known only as KAIJU QUEEN, will they be able to destroy the demon Naga that Yagga has become? Man! All this work just to kill a pimp?!? Jeez! It’s the conclusion of Pimps, Ho's, and Hocus Pocus!
Features a risqué variant, plus regular and risqué “action figure” variant covers by series creator Dan Mendoza, and regular and risqué artist variants by Marcelo Trom (Zombie Tramp specials).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | TMChu | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | TMChu | 2 | C | Action Figure Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | D | Artist Risqué "Zombie Tramp" Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | E | Artist Risqué "Xula" Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Trom | 5 | F | Risque Sketch Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marcelo Trom | 6 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 20:30:06. [CVDB537154]
ComicInfo.Editor: Colleen Boyd, Jason Martin, Kevin Freeman
ComicInfo.Characters: Janey Belle, Kaiju Queen, Morning, Papa Yagga, Xula
